Html:
Hi,

Does anyone have a working example of '33chartcreate-pie.php'?

Every time it creates a .xlsx it says "We found a problem with some content in '33chartcreate-pie.php' Do you want us to recover as much as we can? If you trust the source of this workbook click yes"

When i click yes only the data used to create the chart is there, no chart.

Any help/example of fixing this would be great as I can't see to find what is creating the error.

Thanks

Version:PHPExcel 1.8.0
Using: Microsoft Excel 2013

The latest develop branch on github has a working version

This problem was fixed.

The difference is changing the Plot Grouping from PHPExcel_Chart_DataSeries::GROUPING_STANDARD to NULL
